summary: Osaka is a big city in Japan, known for its economy and culture. It's one of Japan's three biggest cities and the capital of Osaka Prefecture. With over 2.7 million people, it's the third most populous city in Japan. Osaka has a long history, serving as an important port and even as the imperial capital during certain periods. It became a major industrial center after the Meiji Restoration and is now a financial hub with famous landmarks like Osaka Castle and the Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan. The city is also home to many universities and multinational companies.
title: Osaka
